pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Johnny Green sound recordings and motion pictures, 1934-1989
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Consists of rehearsal, demo, and master recordings made by Green of motion picture soundtracks, television and radio broadcasts, and concert performances. Includes sound recordings made by others in which Green is featured. Also includes copies of motion pictures and television broadcasts that relate to Green's career.
pageContext._xxxcollectionNotesxtxt: There are other significant collections related to Johnny Green at the Harvard Theatre Collection.
